title: What key should you bind your mastery flash too
body:
{{champion:75}} Q

{{champion:58}} E

{{champion:1}} R

{{champion:55}} R

{{champion:31}} R

{{champion:3}} Q

{{champion:24}} Right mouse button

{{champion:8}} W

{{champion:105}} E

{{champion:117}} W

{{champion:51}} Right mouse Button

{{champion:236}} E


{{champion:157}} Enter Key

replies.body: And to this day, the enemy team remains tilted due to excessive mastery flashing.

{{champion:98}} R

*Starts channeling ult*

{{champion:122}} "Oh shit I better do something."

{{champion:98}} *Mastery 7 appears* "So long, gay bowser!"

{{champion:122}} *Apprehends thin air* "...shit."
Is that a Mario n64 reference
Always bind it to alt+F4. Super easy to punch in.

Unfortunately, you cannot make a key activate an ability and do master taunt.

The fact that I've tried this says something bad about me.
